title: Jacob Faturechi on Judaism, Kabbalah, and Jesus
description:
Jacob Faturechi is an orthodox Jew with very interesting and unique perspectives on Jesus and the relationship between Judaism and Christianity. Jacob has a youtube channel where he teaches Hebrew interpretation of the Bible: https://www.youtube.com/user/faturechi/videos?view=0&sort=p&flow=grid

Jacob and I have spent a lot of time conversing about these topic on Paul Vanderklay's discord server. This is our first recorded conversation. We talk about the Messiah ben Joseph, the Gospel of John, Monotheism, the Angel of the Lord, and many other topics.

00:00:00 - Intro and Jacob's background
00:08:30 - Judaism, Christianity, and Jesus
00:12:00 - Kabbalah esoteric/exoteric
00:14:00 - Messiah Ben Joseph
00:30:30 - Jesus in Jewish Tradition
00:36:45 - The importance of Monotheism
00:40:30 - I am
00:53:20 - Son of Man in Aramaic
01:10:30 - Forgiveness of Sins
01:16:00 - Scribes, Pharisees, and Sadducees
01:24:10 - The Angel of the Lord
01:29:30 - The average Trinitarian
01:31:45 - Targums and the Memra
01:34:45 - Prayer Intercession and the Metadivine
01:38:00 - The Shema
01:40:15 - Of God and Men
